contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1910 D Frodsham Contest
Frodsham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
frodsham-contest
None
Robin Hood [MacFarren arr. Godfrey]
Mersey View Pleasure Grounds, Frodsham, Cheshire Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £2. From Brass Band News October 1910 "Everything passed off well except that the Kirkdale Subscription Band, being drawn No. 1, insisted on ignoring the call, and went on rehearsing, consequently they were rightly and properly disqualified, but allowed to play last as a disqualified band. They were awarded second place, but no prize. Promoted by Frodsham Subscription Band. 14 bands competed.
June 5, 2018, 5:53 a.m. June 5, 2018, 7:30 a.m.
